attributes.action: Why do we not all contribute an extra 1p in the pound in tax to save the NHS
attributes.additional_details: An extra 1p in the pound on tax would raise approx £4.5 billion.
attributes.background: At some point we have all either used, are using or will use the NHS. We all try and put something away for a rainy day, so why would we view putting money in to the NHS as anything other than an investment not a cost. We need to ensure that the service is available to all of us when we need it.
